modules.name: Run.Streaming
modules.comments:
This module defines primitives for bidirectional streams analagous to
the Haskell `Pipes` library. Namely, streams may be either push or pull
and can propagate information both upstream and downstream.

declarations.comments: Yields a value to be consumed downstream.
declarations.title: yield

declarations.comments: Awaits a value upstream.
declarations.title: await

declarations.comments: Issues a request and awaits a response.
declarations.title: request

declarations.comments: Yields a response and waits for a request.
declarations.title: respond

declarations.comments: Producers yield values of type `o` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Producer

declarations.comments: Consumers await values of type `i` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Consumer

declarations.comments: Transformers await values `i` and yield values `o` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Transformer

declarations.comments: Clients issue requests `req` and await responses `res` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Client

declarations.comments: Servers reply to requests `req` with responses `res` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Server

declarations.comments: A full bidirectional Pipe acts as an upstream Client and a downstream Server.
declarations.title: Pipe

declarations.comments:
Subsitutes the outputs of the second argument with the continuation of the
first argument, and vice versa, interleaving the two.
declarations.title: interleave

declarations.comments:
Substitutes the outputs of the second argument with the effects of the
first argument, feeding the result back in to the stream.
declarations.title: substitute

declarations.comments: Transformers await values `i` and yield values `o` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Transformer

declarations.comments: Servers reply to requests `req` with responses `res` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Server

declarations.comments: Producers yield values of type `o` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Producer

declarations.comments: A full bidirectional Pipe acts as an upstream Client and a downstream Server.
declarations.title: Pipe

declarations.comments: Consumers await values of type `i` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Consumer

declarations.comments: Clients issue requests `req` and await responses `res` using effects `r`.
declarations.title: Client

declarations.comments: Yields a value to be consumed downstream.
declarations.title: yield

declarations.comments: Yields a response and waits for a request.
declarations.title: respond

declarations.comments: Issues a request and awaits a response.
declarations.title: request

declarations.comments: Awaits a value upstream.
declarations.title: await

declarations.comments: Connects a Consumer to an effect which fulfills the request.
declarations.title: into

declarations.comments: Connects a Consumer to a Producer.
declarations.title: feed

declarations.comments: Consumes all values with effects.
declarations.title: consume

declarations.comments: Loops over a Server/Producer with effects, feeding the result in as a request.
declarations.title: traverse

declarations.comments: Produce values via an effect.
declarations.title: produce

declarations.comments: `traverse` with the arguments flipped.
declarations.title: for

declarations.comments: Loop an effect forever.
declarations.title: forever

declarations.comments: Forwards incoming values downstream.
declarations.title: cat

declarations.comments: Adapts incoming values.
declarations.title: map

declarations.comments: Filters incoming values based on a predicate.
declarations.title: filter

declarations.comments: Turns an arbitrary Foldable into a Producer.
declarations.title: each

declarations.comments: Forwards all individual values in an incoming Foldable downstream.
declarations.title: concat

declarations.comments: Composition of `map` followed by `concat`.
declarations.title: concatMap

declarations.comments:
Takes a specified number of values from the head of the stream, terminating
upon completion.
declarations.title: take

declarations.comments:
Takes values from the head of the stream as determined by the provided
predicate. Terminates when the predicate fails.
declarations.title: takeWhile

declarations.comments: Drops a specified number of values from the head of the stream.
declarations.title: drop

declarations.comments:
Drops values from the head of the stream as determined by the provided
predicate. Forwards all subsequent values.
declarations.title: dropWhile

declarations.comments: Folds over the input, yielding each step.
declarations.title: scan

declarations.comments: Joins two Producers into one.
declarations.title: zipWith

declarations.comments: Joins two Producers with a Tuple.
declarations.title: zip

declarations.comments: Yields successive values until exhausted.
declarations.title: succ

declarations.comments: Checks whether a Producer is empty.
declarations.title: null

declarations.comments: Returns the first value of a Producer.
declarations.title: head

declarations.comments: Returns the last value of a Producer.
declarations.title: last

declarations.comments:
Checks if all yielded values from a Producer satisfy the predicate. Stops
as soon as one fails.
declarations.title: all

declarations.comments:
Checks if any yielded values from a Producer satisfy the predicate. Stops as
soon as one passes.
declarations.title: any

declarations.comments: Checks if all yielded values are true.
declarations.title: and

declarations.comments: Checks if any yielded values are true.
declarations.title: or

declarations.comments: Checks if a value occurs in the stream.
declarations.title: elem

declarations.comments: Finds the first value that satisfies the provided predicate.
declarations.title: find

declarations.comments: Finds the value at the given offset in the stream.
declarations.title: index

declarations.comments: Finds the index for the first value that satisfies the provided predicate.
declarations.title: findIndex

declarations.comments: Folds over a Producer, returning the summary.
declarations.title: fold

declarations.comments: Folds over a Producer, but also returns the final value of the stream.
declarations.title: fold'

declarations.comments: Folds over a Producer with `Run` effects.
declarations.title: foldM

declarations.comments:
Folds over a Producer with `Run` effects, but also returns the final value
of the stream.
declarations.title: foldM'

declarations.comments: Returns the number of values yielded by a Producer.
declarations.title: length

declarations.comments: Returns the sum of values yielded by a Producer.
declarations.title: sum

declarations.comments: Returns the product of values yielded by a Producer.
declarations.title: product

declarations.comments: Returns the minimum value yielded by a Producer.
declarations.title: minimum

declarations.comments: Returns the maximum value yielded by a Producer.
declarations.title: maximum

declarations.comments: Unfold into a Producer given a seed.
declarations.title: unfold

modules.name: Run.Streaming.Pull
modules.comments: This modules defines primitive fusion operations for pull streams.

declarations.comments: Connects a Server to a Client which can fulfill requests from the Client.
declarations.title: chain

declarations.comments: Fulfills a Client with effects.
declarations.title: traverse

declarations.comments: `traverse` with the arguments flipped.
declarations.title: for

declarations.comments: Point-free pull composition.
declarations.title: compose

declarations.comments: `compose` with the arguments flipped.
declarations.title: composeFlipped

declarations.comments: Connects a Producer to a Consumer.
declarations.title: draw

declarations.comments: Connects a Consumer to a Producer.
declarations.title: feed

declarations.comments: Connect an effect to a Consumer, fulfilling the request.
declarations.title: from

declarations.comments: Connects a Consumer to an effect which fulfills the request.
declarations.title: into

declarations.comments: Consumes all values with effects.
declarations.title: consume

modules.name: Run.Streaming.Push
modules.comments: This modules defines primitive fusion operations for push streams.

declarations.comments: Connects a Client to a Server which can react to responses from the Server.
declarations.title: chain

declarations.comments: Loops over a Server/Producer with effects, feeding the result in as a request.
declarations.title: traverse

declarations.comments: `traverse` with the arguments flipped.
declarations.title: for

declarations.comments: Point-free push composition.
declarations.title: compose

declarations.comments: `compose` with the arguments flipped.
declarations.title: composeFlipped

declarations.comments: Produce values via an effect.
declarations.title: produce
